scripts.watch: TSLINT=none ESLINT=none BROWSER=none RELEASE_ENV=DEV roadhog dev
scripts.build: TSLINT=none ESLINT=none BROWSER=none RELEASE_ENV=RELEASE roadhog build
scripts.startExample: export PORT=9100 RELEASE_MODULE=example && npm run watch
scripts.startApp: export PORT=9101 RELEASE_MODULE=app && npm run watch
scripts.startCas: export PORT=9102 RELEASE_MODULE=cas && npm run watch
scripts.release: rimraf dist/* && rimraf prod_*/** &&yarn run releaseApp && yarn run releaseCas && yarn run releaseExample
